sentences.english: In stimulate module test of no-tillage seeder, its transfer functions were obtained.

sentences.english: In negative modals, "Deny" modal is the strongest cognitive negation.
sentences.chinese: 在負的模態詞中，“拒斥”是最強的認知否定。

sentences.english: Modal logic is the logic of necessity and possibility.
sentences.chinese: 模態邏輯是關於必要性和可能性的邏輯。

sentences.english: Monadic Boolean algebras also have an important connection to modal logic.
sentences.chinese: 一元布爾代數還與模態邏輯有重要聯繫。

sentences.english: Objective To co-register multi-modal serial images by non-rigid transforming.
sentences.chinese: 目的對多模態非剛性變換序列圖像進行配準。

sentences.english: In the difficult mode, you have two spacemen to contend with.
sentences.chinese: 在困難的模態中，你需要同時操作二個太空人。

sentences.english: Mutual information is an important method for multimodal medical image registration.
sentences.chinese: 互信息是多模態醫學圖像配準的一種重要方法。

sentences.english: The 3-D finite element model is built for the modal analysis of board-level package.
sentences.chinese: 建立了板級封裝的三維有限元模型並進行模態分析。

sentences.english: The effects of design parameter changes were investigated on system natural frequence and vibration modes.
sentences.chinese: 分析了物理參數對系統固有頻率和模態的影響。

sentences.english: Coupling between Tropospheric and Stratospheric Leading Modes.

sentences.english: The restraint of these sensitive modes calls for the increase of the damping of circular saw plate structure.

sentences.english: An enemy compound is a great example of an objective that can be built in a non-modal way.
sentences.chinese: 藏有敵人的建築是一個非常好的非模態目標。

sentences.english: The summer monsoon of East Asia and monsoon mode also has obvious interdecadal changes.
sentences.chinese: 東亞夏季風和季風模態還存在明顯的年代際變化。

sentences.english: Provide modeless feedback to help users avoid mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 提供非模態反饋來幫助避免用戶犯錯誤。

sentences.english: Upon on the basis, the free interface CMS theory was developed for hysteretic damping structure.
